General Bentnoze is one of the two Goblin Generals, found in the northernmost part of Goblin Village. He plays a major role in the quest Goblin Diplomacy.

He is always found standing next to his rival general, General Wartface, whom he constantly argues with over armour colours. He favours the colour red while his opponent prefers the colour green.

Contents

  • 1 Treasure Trails
  • 2 Dialogue
  • 3 Changes
  • 4 Gallery (historical)
  • 5 Trivia

Treasure Trails[edit | edit source]

  • General Bentnoze is the solution to the hard cryptic clue: Generally speaking, his nose was very bent. Players will need to solve a puzzle box.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
22 February 2005
(update)

The NPC now always appears above players standing in the same tile.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The original version of General Bentnoze, used since 2006, remains in the game cache.

'''General Bentnoze''' is one of the two [[Goblin]] Generals, found in the northernmost part of [[Goblin Village]]. He plays a major role in the quest [[Goblin Diplomacy]].

He is always found standing next to his rival general, [[General Wartface]], whom he constantly argues with over armour colours. He favours the colour red while his opponent prefers the colour green.
{{clear|left}}

*{{CrypticNPC|General Bentnoze|hard|Generally speaking, his nose was very bent.}} Players will need to solve a [[puzzle box]].
